Name: Frequency of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' compared to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that proceed to 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' after a 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurrences before 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all review-related activities
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Declined' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' followed by 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in manuscripts that require major revision versus those that are accepted ('SW-EIC Major Revision' vs 'RW-EIC Accept')
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in relation to 'SW-Reviewer No Response'
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities that lead to assigning a different editor ('Assign a Different Editor')
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in the first round of review versus subsequent rounds
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' does not occur

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' followed by 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' in the process variants
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' for manuscripts that exceed the Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold ('Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded')
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities for cases where activity 'Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' before 'SW-Checklist Completed'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in manuscripts that undergo 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' more than once
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in relation to all activities performed by the SYSTEM performer
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' that are followed by a 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in manuscripts that are eventually rejected ('SW-EIC Reject' or 'RSW-EIC Reject')
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Reject' occurs

Name: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurrences per year in the event log
